snippet: The Dubai-based company, which operates in the Middle East, Southeast Asia, India and parts of Africa, said it hoped to issue shares valued at a minimum of $500 million later this year.
abstract: The Dubai-based company, which operates in the Middle East, Southeast Asia, India and parts of Africa, said it hoped to issue shares valued at a minimum of $500 million later this year.

headline.main: Oil Rig Operator Shelf Drilling to List in London
